title: Can Riot fix the way on-hit effects interact with dodges and blinds?
body:
This is a problem I've always come across. Even while Jax has activated Counterstrike, or Teemo blinds the enemy Udyr, both still get effected by most on-hit effects. (I believe this includes Quinn blind as well)

Examples include Udyr Q and E, Blitz E and, in particular, Nasus Q. Everyone thinks that Jax can beat a 700 stack Nasus. Although Jax is (hopefully) pretty tanky, he still receives a ton of damage while E is active from the Nasus Q. Teemo still gets knocked up after blinding the enemy Blitzcrank.

Anything I've missed, please let me know.

replies.body: Ummm as far as i know, the Blitzcrank E should go through (not the nas Q to my knowledge)
